hero.headline: AI agents for the work humans shouldn’t be doing
hero.subheading: We design, build, and run specialized AI agents for Saudi and global businesses—starting with payroll, collections, and healthcare visibility, and extending to any workflow where a digital teammate can do the job better.
hero.microcopy: A studio for custom and off-the-shelf AI agents—built on your data, your systems, and your rules.

what.title: A studio for building AI teammates, not just tools
what.copy: Most software gives you more dashboards. .exefai gives you agents—digital teammates that own an outcome: payroll filed, invoices collected, patients acquired, reports generated.
what.cta: Explore what an agent can do
what.bullet1: Each agent is specialized for one problem.
what.bullet2: Agents plug into your existing systems and data.
what.bullet3: You can start with our ready-made agents or design your own.

agents.title: Start fast with proven agents
agents.microcopy: These are just three examples. The same agent pattern can be applied to operations, finance, sales, support, and more.

ameen.name: Ameen
ameen.description: Protects Saudi payroll from errors, penalties, and portal chaos.
ameen.point1: Connects to your HR system, validates against Qiwa, ZATCA, GOSI, Mudad, and files with a full audit trail.
ameen.point2: Result: 40+ hours/month saved, far fewer errors, calm payroll cycles.

mueen.name: Mueen
mueen.description: A digital collections teammate who never forgets a follow-up and talks to customers in Arabic at scale.
mueen.point1: Scores accounts, runs personalized outreach, resolves simple cases, and routes complex ones to your team with context.
mueen.point2: Result: More payments, faster cash, less manual chasing.

hadi.name: Hadi
hadi.description: Makes your hospital, clinic, or telehealth brand visible inside AI answers.
hadi.point1: Audits your online presence, optimizes for AI understanding, and monitors how often AI recommends you.
hadi.point2: Result: 150–300 extra patient inquiries per month, 10–21 day payback.

build.title: or design a custom agent for your workflow
build.intro: If you can describe the work in steps, we can design an agent to own it from start to finish.

step1.title: Define the outcome
step1.desc: What should the agent own? “Payroll fully filed,” “DSO reduced,” “X patients per month,” “Monthly board report ready,” etc.

step2.title: Map the workflow
step2.desc: We break down the current steps, systems, roles, and edge cases.

step3.title: Build & integrate
step3.desc: We design the agent’s brain (logic, prompts, tools, integrations) and connect it to your stack.

step4.title: Run & improve
step4.desc: We monitor performance, handle edge cases, and refine the agent based on real usage.

philosophy.title: Many small agents beat one giant “AI”
philosophy.copy: Instead of one huge model trying to do everything, .exefai follows a multi-agent philosophy: multiple specialized agents that each own one job and collaborate when needed.

benefits.item1: Clear ownership: each agent has a KPI, not just “intelligence.”
benefits.item2: Safer: easier to test, monitor, and govern when each agent has a narrow scope.
benefits.item3: Easier to adopt: teams can start with one agent and add more over time.
